meanings.definition: A trademark for an alloy of iron and nickel, typically containing about 80% nickel and 20% iron, used in magnetic cores and in the manufacture of transformers and other electrical equipment.
meanings.sent1: The permalloy was essential for creating the magnetic core of the transformer.
meanings.sent2: The company used permalloy to make efficient electrical equipment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the permalloy for a shiny nut!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as magnetic as permalloy, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The permalloy gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its magnetic properties.
